exact_source: SQM to spend a minimum of $500,000 on exploration by 15 December 2025 to retain its 30% interest in Kali’s DOM’s Hill and Pear Creek tenements... SQM have committed to an additional $1,000,000 of expenditure, now $4,250,000 by 15 December 2026, to earn a 50% interest in the expanded JV tenements. (The A$500k + A$1M new/amended commitment from this announcement = A$1.5M * 0.70 USD/AUD = USD 1,050,000).
